author: Reed Albergotti
title: Weed is deemed ‘essential’ in California, but many pot businesses are on the brink of failure - The Washington Post
description: Weed is deemed ‘essential’ in California, but many pot businesses are on the brink of failure The Washington Post Virus fuels pot industry's push for online sales, delivery ABC News View Full Coverage on Google News
content: Theres no money thats going to be coming into the sector, says Nicholas Kovacevich, CEO of KushCo Holdings, a major distributor to marijuana dispensaries. All of these companies, including us, need to get profitable really quickly or risk running out of money… [+8605 chars]
